name: 林鈞陶
objective:
一、線性聯立方程式
二、矩陣基本運算
三、行列式
四、向量空間與基底
五、線性相依與線性獨立
六、特徵值與特徵向量
七、正交投影與矩陣分析
schedule:
(將依實際授課進度調整)
Week 1: Introduction.
Week 2: Linear Equations in Algebra.
Week 3: Linear Equations in Algebra. 
Week 4: Matrix Algebra.
Week 5: Matrix Algebra.
Week 6: Determinants.
Week 7: Determinants.
Week 8: Vector Space.
Week 9: Midterm 
Week 10: Vector Space.
Week 11: Eigenvalues and Eigenvectors. 
Week 12: Eigenvalues and Eigenvectors. 
Week 13: Eigenvalues and Eigenvectors.
Week 14: Orthogonality and Least Squares.
Week 15: Orthogonality and Least Squares.

Week 17: Symmetric Matrices and Quadratic Forms.
Week 18: Final Exam.
materials: Linear Algebra and Its Applications (by David. C. Lay 6th-Edition)
remarks:
